verbs.description: sonic christmas parade marks 15th birthday in lafayette event to [V: be] live streamed the 90-minute parade kicks off at 1 p m sunday dec 2 in downtown lafayette at the jefferson street underpass and will conclude in the oil center lafayette parade usa
